mapper.sql: xzqh_dm, xzqhmc, xzqdjbj, sjxzqh_dm, gj_dm, qybj, czrq, xgrq, user_dm
mapper.insert:
insert into dm_cs_xzqh
xzqh_dm,
xzqhmc,
xzqdjbj,
sjxzqh_dm,
gj_dm,
qybj,
czrq,
xgrq,
user_dm,
#{xzqhDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{xzqhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{xzqdjbj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{sjxzqhDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{gjDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update dm_cs_xzqh
xzqhmc = #{xzqhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xzqdjbj = #{xzqdjbj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sjxzqh_dm = #{sjxzqhDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gj_dm = #{gjDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER},
czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where xzqh_dm = #{xzqhDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dm_cs_xzqh set xzqhmc = #{xzqhmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xzqdjbj = #{xzqdjbj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sjxzqh_dm = #{sjxzqhDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gj_dm = #{gjDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qybj = #{qybj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, czrq = #{czrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, xgrq = #{xgrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, user_dm = #{userDm,jdbcType=INTEGER} where xzqh_dm = #{xzqhDm,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from dm_cs_xzqh where xzqdjbj = #{type} and gj_dm = #{nation}
